title: Chocolate Christmas pudding
ingredients: ['80g dried cranberries', '80g sultanas or raisins', 'Grated zest from one orange', '3 eggs, beaten', '120g soft butter', '120g light soft brown sugar', 'Juice from one lemon or orange', '175g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '80g ground almonds', '100g dark chocolate, chopped into pieces']
